From what is understood at the moment......

921 Lasers - It will fire from the edge of the opt from where the hardpoint is

512 Missiles - It will fire from the middle of the opt from where the hardpoint is

48 Space Bomb - Will fire from the top of the opt, won't drop like space bomb

256 Countermeasures - Not sure...

Info from Trident over ICQ.

Hell Raiser
